overview: Construction worker Buzz Penn has his hands full when a new helper reports o the job. Hammers, nails and saws soon get thrown aside and are replaced by other tools of the trade. Hard and always horny, Buzz makes his way through the rest of the construction team. Also introducing brother Kip, the wet action and hot sex never seems to stop. Stud Sensors is a sight to behold with full XXX rated action in the Avalon tradition. Dont' miss newcommers Buzz, Kip Rory and Jason in their first-ever video screen roles.
tagline: These boys are on the prowl, with their radar out and tracking each other down!
title: Stud Sensors
